Description:
The URL to the imagery service in "XYZ" format, 
e.g. "https://tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"
The similar to XYZ with reverse Y coordinate

The URL to the imagery service in "WMS" format, 
e.g. "https://services.nationalmap.gov/arcgis/services/USGSNAIPImagery/ImageServer/WMSServer"
File of image in GeoTIFF format
